verses.name: Romans 2:1
verses.text: Therefore thou art inexcusable, O man, whosoever thou art that judgest: for wherein thou judgest another, thou condemnest thyself; for thou that judgest doest the same things.

verses.name: Romans 2:2
verses.text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things.

verses.name: Romans 2:3
verses.text: And thinkest thou this, O man, that judgest them which do such things, and doest the same, that thou shalt escape the judgment of God?

verses.name: Romans 2:4
verses.text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance?

verses.name: Romans 2:5
verses.text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God;

verses.name: Romans 2:6
verses.text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds:

verses.name: Romans 2:7
verses.text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality, eternal life:

verses.name: Romans 2:8
verses.text: But unto them that are contentious, and do not obey the truth, but obey unrighteousness, indignation and wrath,

verses.name: Romans 2:9
verses.text: Tribulation and anguish, upon every soul of man that doeth evil, of the Jew first, and also of the Gentile;

verses.name: Romans 2:10
verses.text: But glory, honour, and peace, to every man that worketh good, to the Jew first, and also to the Gentile:

verses.name: Romans 2:11
verses.text: For there is no respect of persons with God.

verses.name: Romans 2:12
verses.text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law: and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law;

verses.name: Romans 2:13
verses.text: (For not the hearers of the law are just before God, but the doers of the law shall be justified.

verses.name: Romans 2:14
verses.text: For when the Gentiles, which have not the law, do by nature the things contained in the law, these, having not the law, are a law unto themselves:

verses.name: Romans 2:15
verses.text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts, their conscience also bearing witness, and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another;)

verses.name: Romans 2:16
verses.text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel.

verses.name: Romans 2:17
verses.text: Behold, thou art called a Jew, and restest in the law, and makest thy boast of God,

verses.name: Romans 2:18
verses.text: And knowest his will, and approvest the things that are more excellent, being instructed out of the law;

verses.name: Romans 2:19
verses.text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind, a light of them which are in darkness,

verses.name: Romans 2:20
verses.text: An instructor of the foolish, a teacher of babes, which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law.

verses.name: Romans 2:21
verses.text: Thou therefore which teachest another, teachest thou not thyself? thou that preachest a man should not steal, dost thou steal?

verses.name: Romans 2:22
verses.text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery, dost thou commit adultery? thou that abhorrest idols, dost thou commit sacrilege?

verses.name: Romans 2:23
verses.text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law, through breaking the law dishonourest thou God?

verses.name: Romans 2:24
verses.text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you, as it is written.

verses.name: Romans 2:25
verses.text: For circumcision verily profiteth, if thou keep the law: but if thou be a breaker of the law, thy circumcision is made uncircumcision.

verses.name: Romans 2:26
verses.text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law, shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision?

verses.name: Romans 2:27
verses.text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature, if it fulfil the law, judge thee, who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law?

verses.name: Romans 2:28
verses.text: For he is not a Jew, which is one outwardly; neither is that circumcision, which is outward in the flesh:

verses.name: Romans 2:29
verses.text: But he is a Jew, which is one inwardly; and circumcision is that of the heart, in the spirit, and not in the letter; whose praise is not of men, but of God.
